charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along a
mountain path when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Bea and Brawly
having a chat.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_0200_:
Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. It’s nice
to see you.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0401_0400_:
Oh, we just finished battling, actually. I asked
Brawly to be my opponent.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0402_0600_:
Brawly agreed to be my opponent, and we had a
couple matches. It was a very productive use of
our time!
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_0700_:
Since we both have Fighting-type Pokémon as
our partners, I was able to learn a lot from
our battles.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_0800_:
How to perfectly gauge the distance between you
and your opponent...and how best to brace
yourself for an attack...
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_0900_:
It was very helpful. There are still many strong
opponents in the world for me to meet.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_1000_:
Today ended for me with one win and one loss.
Unfortunately, that breaks my winning streak
of 29 wins...
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0401_1200_: It’s all thanks to my daily training regimen.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0402_1400_: It’s all thanks to my daily training regimen.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_1500_:
But I won’t let it give me a big head. I need to be
humble and keep getting stronger.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_1600_: Right, then. Time for us to get back to training.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0401_1800_: Are you worried about our health?
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0401_1900_:
I suppose I am a bit tired, and taking on too much
at once isn’t an efficient way to train...
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0302_2000_: Why don’t you take a break?
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0402_2100_:
I suppose that’s a good idea. Rushing headlong
into training won’t produce good results.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_2200_: Very well. Let’s take a break, shall we?
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_2300_:
Phew... I feel much more relaxed now. Thank you
very much for inviting me to join you.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_2400_:
But as effective as that was at relieving
my tension...
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_2500_:
I happen to know another special
relaxation technique.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_2600_: What I do is have Sirfetch’d motivate me!
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_2700_:
Whenever I’m feeling tired or just need a little
extra motivation, I have him whack me on the
back with his leek! It makes me go...
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_2800_: HA! Time to dig in our heels!
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_2900_: And just like that, I’m full of energy!
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_3000_: Would you like to give it a go?
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0401_3200_:
I should warn you, it can be slightly...somewhat,
um...considerably painful. But it is effective!
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0402_3400_:
Yes! In the sense that I feel re-energized to take
on whatever comes our way!
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_3500_: Hm? Sirfetch’d is telling me to stop?
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_3600_:
I think he’s trying to say now’s not the time and
that we should rest our bodies.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_3700_:
Understood. Maybe we can save that motivating
whack for some other time.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_3800_:
Right now, we should rest our bodies and
replenish our sugar reserves!
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0401_4000_:
I don’t say this out loud very often, but...I actually
have quite a sweet tooth.
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_0402_4200_:
Yes... I try not to tell people about it, but I really
enjoy sweet things...
charaepi_ch0250_00_saida/2301_1201_4300_:
It’s rather embarrassing. Could you perhaps keep
that a secret between us?
